about_the_game:
Command your own army with Keicho Nijimura's stand Worse Company, now available in All-Star Battle R! Mobilize Keicho's troops, tanks, and helicopters to blow your opponents away!

Contents:
- Keicho Nijimura as a playable character
- Additional Keicho Nijimura JoJo Glossary, Model Viewer, Sound Test, and Art Viewer
- Additional Keicho Nijimura collection items at the in-game store

*Please note the Season Pass includes this DLC so be careful not to purchase this twice.
detailed_description:
Command your own army with Keicho Nijimura's stand Worse Company, now available in All-Star Battle R! Mobilize Keicho's troops, tanks, and helicopters to blow your opponents away!

*Please note the Season Pass includes this DLC so be careful not to purchase this twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 or Intel Core i3-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9590 or Intel Core i5-5675C
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Supported

short_description: Command your own army with Keicho Nijimura's stand Worse Company, now available in All-Star Battle R! Mobilize Keicho's troops, tanks, and helicopters to blow your opponents away!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
